lemma onll_step_invariant_sterms: assumes wf: "wellformed \<Gamma>" and si: "A \<TTurnstile>\<^sub>A (I \<rightarrow>) onll \<Gamma> P" and sr: "(\<xi>, p) \<in> reachable A I" and sos: "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> trans A" and "I a" and "l'\<in>labels \<Gamma> q" and "p'\<in>sterms \<Gamma> p" and "l\<in>labels \<Gamma> p'" shows "P ((\<xi>, l), a, (\<xi>', l'))"
